subject: General Science
question: What is the SI unit of speed?
explanation_step_by_step: SI unit of distance is meter
SI unit of time is second
Therefore, SI unit of speed is meter per second
exam_tip: Very basic and frequently asked unit question

subject: General Science

explanation_step_by_step: Newton’s Second Law states that Force = mass × acceleration
